actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #125 (103-226).

official_title: A bill to provide that the incumbent Librarian of Congress shall on certain conditions be deemed a congressional employee for civil service retirement purposes.

summary.text: Provides that the incumbent Librarian of Congress shall on fulfillment of specified conditions be deemed a congressional employee for civil service retirement purposes.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the incumbent Librarian of Congress shall on certain conditions be deemed a congressional employee for civil service retirement purposes.
